I can have us relocated...$7"/speak Lewis "$q -1 null#I can have us relocated...#$r -1 0 event_relocate1#Yes, please do.#$r -1 0 event_relocate2#We can worry about it later.#$r -1 0 event_relocate3#The bed looks big enough for both of us."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap meetingRoom/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 7 8/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Lewis 5 8/faceDirection Lewis 0/addTemporaryActor Khari 16 32 5 5 2 true/addTemporaryActor Lin 16 32 7 5 2 true/addTemporaryActor James 16 32 3 7 2 true/addTemporaryActor Hank 16 32 9 7 2 true/viewport 6 5 true/pause 500/speak Khari "I'd like to welcome you all to Zuzu City for our annual town leadership meeting.#$b#Let's all introduce ourselves, shall we?#$b#My name is Khari, and I'm the mayor of Zuzu City."/speak Lin "I am Mayor Lin of Tulip Town."/speak Hank "M'name's Hank. Entries.noZuzu: pause 500/speak Lewis "Oh... I suppose it was short notice. Well, there's always next year...#$b#...$s"/pause 500/speak Lewis "Well, have a productive day, @. I'll see you when I'm back from Zuzu City.$s"/friendship Lewis -250/end position 64 16
